title: BEST CHINESE STIR FRY SAUCE
directions: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl or Tupperware and mix well
Stir fry about 2 cups any combination of diced vegetables and/or seafood, chicken or beef until protein is just cooked through
When just done, add 1/2 to 2/3 of sauce, mix and let thicken slightly â€“ about a minute and serve
ingredients: 1/4 cup chicken broth, vegetable broth or even water
